meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be absorbed.
meanings.sent1: The absorbabilities of sponges make them great for cleaning up spills.
meanings.sent2: The absorbabilities of different fabrics vary, affecting how quickly they dry.
meanings.sent3: The absorbabilities of the paper towels were put to the test during the water balloon fight.
meanings.sent4: Her absorbabilities in learning new languages were compared to a sponge soaking up water.
meanings.sent5: The absorbabilities of the soil were crucial for the growth of the plants.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something can be absorbed.
meanings.sent1: The absorbabilities of the soil determine how well it retains water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the absorbabilities of different materials to improve water filtration systems.
meanings.sent3: The absorbabilities of the sponge were so impressive that it soaked up the entire spill in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The absorbabilities of the market for new products were quickly reaching saturation.
meanings.sent5: The absorbabilities of the sponge were put to the test with a bucket of water.
